name: Snow Truck Parking - Extreme Off-Road Winter Driving Simulator FREE
name_original: Snow Truck Parking - Extreme Off-Road Winter Driving Simulator FREE
description:
Get ready for Extreme winter driving in this amazing Snow truck simulator. Plow through the snow in an attempt to park your truck. Don’t hit anything or else it’s game over. Be careful, the roads are slippery.

Features:
-Realistic 3D graphics
-3 Off-Road Trucks to choose from
-Many challenging levels of play.
